examples: Everyone liked my father—he was the perfect gentleman.
A todo el mundo le agradaba mi padre, era el perfecto caballero.
He (= the man we are watching) went through that door.
Él (= el hombre al que estamos mirando) atravesó esa puerta.
Every child needs to know that he is loved.
Todo niño necesita saber que es amado.
He who (= anyone who) hesitates is lost.
Aquel que (= cualquiera que) vacile está perdido.
